Zombie_card.NAME: Zombie
Zombie_card.DESCRIPTION: Summons a zombie with stats 0/0/5 that can soak 5 additional damage. It intents to do nothing on its turn.

Claw_Strike.NAME: Strike
Claw_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This summons a claw with stats 4/0/3 that has summoning sickness. Its intent will be to attack on every turn.

Resilience.NAME: Resilience
Resilience.DESCRIPTION: All current minions gain 1 Armor to their stats.

AggressiveCard.NAME: Aggressive
AggressiveCard.DESCRIPTION: All current minions gain 1 Attack to their stats.

Wraith_card.NAME: Wraith
Wraith_card.DESCRIPTION: Summons a wraith with stats 5/0/20 with low priority. When it attacks it applies 2 weak and 1 vulnerable.
